summary: Luck, Suggestion and Determination must guide Spider-man through this trip into the 5th dimension. Spider-man finds himself face to face with The Skeletal Infinata, how can he defeat something that is completely of the mind?
cast: Paul Kligman|Paul Soles|Peg Dixon|Bernard Cowan|Chris Wiggins
director: Directors: Cosmo Anzilotti, Ralph Bakshi | 2 more credits »
title: Revolt in the Fifth Dimension
